content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you with any HVAC, plumbing, or electrical needs. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Walter! Could you please provide your address so I can check our availability in your area?
Thanks, Walter. Can you please describe what HVAC issue you’re experiencing, or let me know if you need a specific service?
The air conditioning isn't working well anymore. It sort of blows warm air sometimes.
Thank you for sharing that. When would be an ideal time for a technician to come by and take a look at your air conditioning?
Oh, my wife needs to decide about that. I can't set up an appointment without her okay. Sorry about that.
reason: Customer needs spouse’s approval before scheduling. Did not book.
